scripts.build:prod: yarn build:extensions && pm2 start "yarn gql:start" --name gql-server && wait-on -c wait-on-config.js && cross-env GRAPHQL_SERVER=http://localhost:5000/graphql yarn build; status=$?; pm2 delete gql-server; exit $status
scripts.build:storybook: yarn build:extensions && pm2 start "yarn gql:start" --name gql-server && wait-on -c wait-on-config.js && cross-env GRAPHQL_SERVER=http://localhost:5000/graphql yarn build-storybook; status=$?; pm2 delete gql-server; exit $status
scripts.build-storybook: lerna run build --scope @lrns/components  --include-dependencies && lerna run build-storybook
scripts.clean: lerna exec 'rm -rf node_modules/ dist/'; rm -rf node_modules/; yarn install
scripts.deps:check: echo "-- depcheck for root --"; depcheck . --specials=babel,eslint,prettier,webpack,bin,jest; for d in ./packages/*/ ; do (echo "-- depcheck for $d --"; depcheck "$d" --specials=babel,eslint,prettier,webpack,bin,jest); done;manypkg check
scripts.dev: yarn propagate:env && lerna run dev --parallel --scope @lrns/web --include-dependencies --loglevel silly
